description: This schema represents the output of a model developed by Kumar et. al. that uses inputs denoting physiological arousal to calculate the probability of a person's being stressed.

references.description: The Psychology Ontology code represents Physiological arousal, defined as Condition of alertness and readiness to respond as evidenced by physiological signs such as heart rate or blood pressure.

probability_of_stress_value_set.description: If probability of stress above a predetermined threshold then 0, otherwise 1.
